website_summaries.verdict: The Keds Champion CVO exudes a leisurely look that is not flashy yet still manages to catch the eye. Priced reasonably, this low-top sneaker also has the advantage of being low-maintenance, breathable, sturdily-made, and supportive of the arch.Some buyers reported that the shoe runs long. However, this is a relatively minor disadvantage as purchasers can easily go down a size. The shoe also has a thin sole which might not work for extended wear but which would be perfect for strolling and all kinds of casual use.
pros: Most users who bought the Keds Champion CVO loved the fit (width-wise) of this sneaker
Many reviewers liked the “classy” and “sassy” style of the low-top Keds footwear
They also said it was an easy shoe to wear because it goes with almost everything
The Champion CVO is a comfortable sneaker that is best for everyday casual wear, several testers remarked
A good number of people said the lifestyle shoe had excellent quality for its price
One buyer stated that she loved the stitching at the toe which was unexpected and cute
The classic colors of the Keds Champion CVO got the thumbs up from some purchasers
The price of the casual shoe is quite reasonable, reported a few customers
A handful of consumers were delighted with how relatively low maintenance the footwear is
A couple of persons were happy with the durable build of the shoe
One of them recounted how his last pair lasted him years
The Champion CVO has a nice support in the arch, a user stated
This low-top sneaker by Keds is quite breathable, one pleased individual commented
cons: A few people complained that the Keds Champion shoe runs long
They added that they had to order at least a half size down
The sole of this low-top shoe is quite thin, one person reported

customer_reviews.title: Fake keds
customer_reviews.text: I am a ked’s fan and right off the bat I could tell they were fake but are being sold at the Ked price. You can tell the “rubber” soles are not rubber at all but a mix of plastic and rubber. They’re fake!
customer_reviews.author: Regi

customer_reviews.title: Why has it been 30 years since I last had a pair?
customer_reviews.text: Yup. I was 10 when I had my last pair of Keds, and I don't know why, because they're cute and comfortable. I despise the typical chunky white tennis shoes that make my 9W feet look like bricks. I don't really care for my thick legs, knees and ankles, BUT these are slim and enhance the shape of my legs, and the low cut shows my ankles nicely. I'm going to really enjoy wearing these with skirts and dresses throughout the spring and summer as well as with jeans and leggings.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Everything as advertised
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the negative reviews on these Keds, I was hesitant. I was looking for the old-fashioned white sneaker Keds that were like the ones I had as a teenager. (We called them tennis shoes at that time.) I went ahead and ordered them and am so glad. They were just like the ones I used to wear long ago. I ordered my regular size and they fit perfectly. While I can't as yet comment on their quality, they appear to be great and I wore them for the first time today shopping. No blisters; they were very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: enjay

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! Fake Keds & Wrong Color! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: These are not real Keds and amazon should be ashamed to have these on their marketplace. They are very clearly fake the second you take them out of the box. The tag on the inside of the tongue is extremely laughable and obviously fake as well. Not only are they fake, the color is in every way off. They are not "white" they are off-white almost light yellow. DO NOT BUY. There is also a black smudge stain on right shoe. Looks worn/used. Save yourself the time and hassle of returning and order from Keds directly and deal with the long shipping and costs.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Brannon

customer_reviews.title: Quality and sizes have changed.
customer_reviews.text: The sizes have changed and the quality. I've worn a 6.5 since I was in my early 30's.....this was many moons ago. I've been wearing women's Keds since I was 16. So I initially purchased a 6.5. It was too nig in the heel and too long. Returned for a size 6 after trying them on in a store. The cushion in the foot bed is thinner, the sole is thinner. The shoelaces are a lot thinner. This causes them to tangle easily. The liner the lining inside the toe box hasn't been stitched in for years, but instead glued in. This has already started to come loose. It would be nice to see some of the previous quality returned.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Shoe sizes run big but definitely comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: My foot has been professionally measured at size 9 with a D width. My first time ordering I chose a 9W. They were way too long. I had 1 1/2 inches to the end of my shoes from my big toe. I sent them back and ordered a 8 1/2 W and now they fit just fine. These shoes run a bit big. Thankfully there are free returns. I love these shoes. I haven't worn canvas shoes since I was a little girl because my feet were wide and brick and mortar stores don't carry wide widths in canvas shoes. Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Jana Parma

customer_reviews.title: Shoes run large
customer_reviews.text: I really need to send these back as they are large both in size and width. I ordered my true size, size 10, and I have a lot of room in them. I could've ordered a 9 1/2 instead. Also I have really wide feet so I ordered the extra wide and it is way too wide. Disappointed as I ordered the size I did, based off of the reviews when I should've just ordered as I knew i should've.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Not What They Were
customer_reviews.text: I've always preferred Keds Champions because they run just a tad narrow, and most sneakers are much too wide for me. However, the pair I just received seems even narrower and shorter than the last pair, which I still have and can compare. The soles are not as thick, and the shoe laces are of extremely thin material, and much narrower than the last pair. How much smaller and thinner are they going to try to make these sneakers, still charging us the same amount? My new Keds are OK, but they aren't as good as they used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Coffeelover

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I own several Keds and love them. These I hated. They felt like cheap, hard canvas. So disappointed. I also purchased the pull on, no laces sneaker. Loved the design. The issue was I couldn’t find a size that fit. My normal size was way too tight. I reordered a larger size. Too big. I ordered a smaller size. Too tight. I reordered my normal size. Hoping that the first pair was sized wrong. No. Too small. I gave one pair to my granddaughter. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!! Fake!
customer_reviews.text: Fake garbage. They look nothing like my previous Keds, which I’m having to replace because my feet grew during pregnancy. These are so narrow that they made my feet sore just trying them on for 5 minutes, and I don’t have wide feet. Will be returning ASAP. Sad Amazon doesn’t protect brands at all and allows overseas manufacturers to sell fake crap directly to consumers. It makes me not want to shop on Amazon at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Berry

customer_reviews.title: BUY THEM NEXT YEA WHEN THEY CORRECT THE COLOR!
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps its the supplier (Keds). Perhaps its the distributor. But this is the 2nd pair of white canvas shoes that i have received that has had a pink sole. I've ordered these shoes on the site before with absolutely no problems. Keds or the distributor needs to put their act together! This is a quality issue and it needs to be addressed with the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Wood

customer_reviews.title: Not the Keds I Remember
customer_reviews.text: I was so looking forward to having Keds for the summer. When I wore them today, my foot started hurting shortly after I started to walk. There is no support whatsoever in the shoe and the soles are very thin. I felt every pebble on the street and after 2 hrs, I could hardly walk. What happened to the Keds I remember as a kid? I could have paid $9.99 at PayLess and gotten a better shoe. I stopped at a drug store and bought some insoles to see if I could take some of the pressure off the bottoms of my feet. Sorry to say I will not be buying any more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I need shoes that are flat on the inside (no arch support) even though I have high arches. Nerve thing with my left foot. Keds are the best for flatness inside. Comfortable. Cute. Even though I need a size 10 and wide (because of nerve thing), they don’t look like big clowns shoes, and I don’t feel like I’m in the circus.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth McNeil

customer_reviews.title: Drastic redesign causes fit problems.
customer_reviews.text: The redesign of this shoe has made it impossible to find a size that fits right. I've ordered 3 times (and soon will have returned the shoe 3 times.) The first time because I couldn't fit my foot in the shoe at all, so I sized up and ordered wide the next two times and the shoe was far too big. If possible try the shoe before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: petunia

customer_reviews.title: Adorable color and super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute shoes for a great price!!! I love the color, the red is adorable and I get a lot of compliments on them. They fit as expected and are comfortable. I have flat feet and these don’t offer a ton of support but more than some other flats. They didn’t really need to be broken in. The sides were just a little stiff. These go great with causal wear, dresses and you can even wear them to work in the right setting with cute pants! Love theses
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: The style changed, not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Not the original style, it's changed from the Keds I'm used to. I now know to look for the arrow/stripes on the inner some of the shoes to ensure its the old style that I'm used to. I was so disappointed to learn the style has changed, it's very tight in the toe now and the "orthopedic" inner sole is very uncomfortable. I can tell by looking that they're inferior quality, I hadn't even worn them and noticed the rubber around the toe was already separating from the canvas and won't last. Just inspect and hope for the best! These were promptly returned
customer_reviews.author: Chimney161Top Contributor: Minecraft

customer_reviews.title: KEDS,KIDS, KEDS
customer_reviews.text: I remember the old Keds ads and not much has changed over the decades. Love these keds! They are a true red which is just what I wanted. I wear an 8 1/2 medium shoe and these fit me perfectly right out of the box. I intend to order another pair or two in other color(s). They are comfortable and sleek looking and as I said, I love 'em!
customer_reviews.author: shirlyujest

customer_reviews.title: If you are sometimes a 71/2, GET 7
customer_reviews.text: I am most of the times 71/2 but my feet are not wide at all, they are just regular - maybe a bit narrow- and I have to say that this shoe is not as narrow as the converse, it’s definitely wider and if you are between sizes and your feet are not wide at all - and I mean, Really WIDE- then get don’t go for that extra half. Get a 7 instead, or a 6 or at 8, etc, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t decide forever whether I should order these shoes or not because a lot of reviewers said they are cheap knockoffs. I’m glad I did order them. They look, fit and feel exactly like the Keds I already own and bought at Macy’s. Very happy with these sneakers
customer_reviews.author: IslandLife

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality material
customer_reviews.text: i work in an office enviornment, so am only on my feet a small portion of the day. In less than a year, the soles are worn through, the lining had cometely separated from the shoe, and my tags are peeling off. I haven't been able to locate any warranty information or even any way to contact the seller. Very disappointed in a brand i had always had confidence in.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: NOT ACCURATE SIZING! WAY TOO SMALL!
customer_reviews.text: Got my normal, narrow size 6. Not even close to being comfortable! These will fit no one's feet! Toes touched the end and they were so tight l had them on fire 30 sec and my feet hurt! I was about to exchange for wide until l read other reviews. I will stick with my $10 walmart white knock offs.
customer_reviews.author: Mustang Lover

customer_reviews.title: SO OBSESSED - WIDE FEET REJOICE
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these in the 8.5 extra wide because they were sold out of the regular wide 8.5 when I ordered them. However I'm kind of glad I did. The extra wide are soooo comfortable. I'm not sure what the regular wide width shoe would've been like but these are cute, canvas is my fave, they're white, they're comfortable, they aren't flat without any support, they have soft thick insoles. I'm sure all their shoes are of this quality so wide foot or narrow I'd recommend these. I've had them for months and like they're STILL fantastic. I want to order more in different colors!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: My favorite style of sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: I always buy this style of Keds canvas sneaker. I wear a size 11 shoe, and when you are a women you don't want your feet looking big and clunky. These make my feet look slender and smaller. I also like the fact that they are comfortable too; and that's important because I wear them 6 days a week for work!
customer_reviews.author: suzyQ

customer_reviews.title: Inauthentic?
customer_reviews.text: I've bought at least 3 pairs of keds a year for the past 4-5 years. Either Keds completely changed their product, or I did not receive an authentic pair of Keds. They are narrower and longer than usual, and much tighter. The padding in the sole seems to be all but gone, and the fabric is a rough cotton that irritates, instead of the typical Keds cloth. They are uncomfortable and feel cheap. I would return, but I wore for 3 hours and caused a blood blister that popped (tmi sorry). Save your money and go to a local retailer for your Keds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the red ones in wide width. I love these shoes! They are comfy and cute. The shoelaces are the perfect length and stay tied all day. That may seem silly, but I hate tying shoelaces. When I look at these shoes on my feet they just make me feel happy. The End.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Engel

customer_reviews.title: They are Keds= Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It has been 20 years since I bought my last Keds due to my store not carrying my size (Wide). Keds today are just like what I remember from years ago.. great comfort and style. I a size 8.5 wide and being concerned they would not fit, I ordered 9, one wide and one extra wide. 9 is a little big for me and I should of ordered my correct size of 8.5 wide. the extra wide is too wide for my foot. Keds are Perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: DopeyD

customer_reviews.title: Runs slightly large and narrow but overall very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes! I wear mostly 8s but I ordered a 7.5 in this and they fit very nicely! I would say they run just a tad large. If I had gotten 8s, my heel would be lifting out of the back I can tell. They run a bit narrow. Overall, I like them a lot for around town shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love the Keds. Years since I wore them and I still love the look. I ordered a 9.5 W and it fits as I expected it to. I noticed in another review questions about the letters and the size not being inside the shoe. The box had 9.5 W and the shoe also has 9.5 W in it. The Keds has no arch support at all. That's the reason for the 4 stars, in today's world all shoes should have good inserts. So I ordered 1/2 size larger in order to use some Abeo inserts, works great. I am so going to enjoy these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: SGYoung

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy on Keds!
customer_reviews.text: I buy 2 pair a year and wear them out. Since Keds are a commodity, I look for price and service. This vendor nails it! I have paid as much as $45 for these same shoes and am delighted to get them for such a reasonable price. I put a pair of inserts for more cushion and arch support and away I go! Thanks so much Charly! I will be buying more in the same color in a few months!
customer_reviews.author: CaliforniaGal

customer_reviews.title: You Can Count On Keds
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 10M in shoes, however, when I order Keds I order an 11M for toe room. The ball of the foot still hits the correct place in the larger size shoe, so I’m able to comfortably wear them. I love the simple lines of this sneaker and I pair them with summer skirts for a fun look. The box they were mailed in was put in a large envelope so I’m not able to keep the box for storage due to shipping damage. The condition of the shoes are fine so I’m pleased with my selection!
customer_reviews.author: Year Around Shopper

customer_reviews.title: A great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: My last pair of tennis shoes were the same shoes, and they've lasted for years, but they needed to be replaced. I tried a less expensive pair, another brand--they looked liike these, but they were so uncomfortable--so I did what I should've done in the first place and ordered these. They were supposed to be here by Friday at the earliest--and they got here on the Monday before. They're comfortable from the start--and I know they'll last. Yes, I would recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Keds have classic style and comfort.
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing the classic Keds again for about 3 years. They remind me of my childhood. My adult son urged me to purchase a pair a few years ago and I have not looked back. These shoes are so very comfortable. I wear them on my daily dog walks and they have held up beautifully all summer. I never have to worry about purchasing them on line because the size never varies from one pair of Keds to another. The shoes are machine washable so they always look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Palm Reader

customer_reviews.title: New design is too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Have been wearing this brand for about 3 years now. Bought a 8.5 regular in store locally and realized design had changed (very narrow in toes) so ordered a size 8 Xtra wide and held up up against my old pair of 8.5 regulars. Same exact size. So why even bother offering extra wide if your not going to make them any wider then your regular shoes? Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Redstone

customer_reviews.title: My favorites for 40 years but
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adore these, we called them "skips" when I was growing up - but they are priced way too high - either by the seller or by KEDS, they are nowhere near worth the price. I bought them, because they are that price and I can't live without my skips, I wear them near every day, but aren't worth the price at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kimba

customer_reviews.title: Deterioration in quality
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several pairs over the past few years and have liked. On the pair before this one, the laces were thinner/stringier. I corrected by taking laces from previous pair. But in the pair I recently bought and returned, the shoe was 3/4" shorter than the pair before. I can easily order a size larger, but over all, the shoes seem cheesier. Amazon needs a new supplier (even if still from China).
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. D. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Size down
customer_reviews.text: The sizing for these keds are a bit off. I usually wear a size 7 in shoes but had to size down all the way to 6. Even the size 6 is still a bit big. However, I’m glad they have wide options now! If you’re thinking of purchasing keds here, i suggest going down .5 -1 whole size down or else it’ll be too big
customer_reviews.author: TheLittleShopper

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: Product is not made by Keds. It is a knock off. The shoes are a full size too small. I've been wearing Keds for years and these are not Keds. This is a rip off and I highly recommend other shoppers avoid purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Quality not like any other Ked Champion I have ever worn.
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Keds Champions tennis shoes for years and I am disappointed with the quality of this pair that I just received. It also fits very tightly in the heel. The pair I previous wore and washed many many times is still a better quality shoe than this one that I just received.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Stalnaker

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, classic, and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes!! Way more comfortable than I expected and they go with EVERYTHING. I usually wear an 8-8.5 in shoes and these were an 8 and had plenty of room. I expected these shoes to rub/leave a blister when I wore them with no socks, but they didn’t! Only thing I worry about is getting the canvas dirty, will have to spray with a waterproofing spray.. I’ve also heard you can toss them in the wash on the gentle cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and great for people with ALS
customer_reviews.text: I have ALS and trying to find a sneaker that wasn’t heavy and the soles were fairly smooth was a long search. I also have wide feet which made my search hard. Stormtrooper shoes were too heavy, a running shoe the soles were too gripping. I remembered the Keds shoes I use to wear as a kid, before these fancy sneakers came about. Well, low and behold I ordered a pair which came in extra wide width. They fit great, Even with my compression socks and regular socks on, can lift my feet a little off the floor. I’ll be ordering a few more pairs, leather for dress shoes and another pair for kicking around.
customer_reviews.author: JulieD

customer_reviews.title: Beware:  cheaped out greed ruined a classic product with low quality
customer_reviews.text: Always wore keds, these new ones got cheaped out, the canvas is flimsy used to be thicker and stiffer, the sole is flatter, the fit has less arch support and is wider and looser probably because of the flimsier canvas, your feet rides up when you take a step. Looks cheaped out, darn they ruined a classic.
customer_reviews.author: KJD

customer_reviews.title: A Little Too Long
customer_reviews.text: Since I bought a wide width, if I had it to do over I’d get a half size down. Maybe they will shrink in the wash so I’ll keep them. These are more comfortable than I remember them when I used to wear them in the 80’s, slightly better arch support. These were made in Vietnam, not China.
customer_reviews.author: L. Gordy

customer_reviews.title: Good everyday shoe
customer_reviews.text: Photo is after several months of wear. Used these as my knockarounds for the last few months. Still holding up very nicely, and I wear them every day. If I get caught in the rain, my toes WILL get wet quickly but that's to be expected. All and all a durable, reliable shoe. Well done, Keds
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keds are the perfect canvas!
customer_reviews.text: They were a gift -- the perfect canvas for zentagle decorating with the special sharpies I got. My seventy year young friend LOVES them. She's never had keds before in her life and loves the fit as well as the 'new' design
customer_reviews.author: Kathie

customer_reviews.title: Narrowest shoe I’ve encountered in my life.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are barely wider than the width of my tv remote and are still somehow longer than my actual foot! I bought these and another pair of Keds in a different style. I’m extremely disappointed and don’t recommend these to anyone looking for roomy comfortable shoes. It’s not happening here. I give it three stars since they are otherwise well made.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: Why don't they make quality shoes anymore?
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if these Keds are original or what but the size I order (13) looks a lot different from those lower than 9 size. This pair looks very cheap like if they were imitation. They don't look nothing like the picture. I can't add pictures because I donated them already. Anyways, I didn't like them. They fall apart easily and started to tear holes on the canvas right after about a month. They do not last long at all, like smaller sizes do.
customer_reviews.author: Eden Joy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you go half a size down!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my regular size 7W and it was too long for me. Returned it for a 6.5W and it's perfect. Love that I can get these in wide as I have some bunion pain with narrow shoes. They're cute, go with every outfit, and have a classic look to them. Really can't beat a pair of white canvas keds.
customer_reviews.author: Siham L

customer_reviews.title: Just like we wore in High School
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 8 1/2 generally. I ordered the Keds in a 9. They feel good and are very roomy as the photos demonstrate in the heel and toe box. The 9 is perfect for wearing a sock or tights in the fall and I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Anne

customer_reviews.title: Staple piece
customer_reviews.text: I love white keds I wear them with almost anything. I got a size 10 in women because I wear a 10 in women and 8 in men and they are true to size whenever they get dirty I just throw them in the wash and let them air dry (if you put them in the dryer they might shrink) overall it's a great shoe and staple piece
customer_reviews.author: Black Barbie 👸🏾

customer_reviews.title: Male sizes
customer_reviews.text: Updated review They are guy sizes! Just order what you would in mens I originally am size 8 so i got a 6 ( after returning my 7’s lol) but my friend told me to do mens sizes so i exchanged for 6 and they are perfect and cute :) Love keds
customer_reviews.author: OliveNait

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and they last!
customer_reviews.text: I have extra-wide feet... I have my mom to thank for that. In length they're about a size 7. I buy my Keds in a 7.5WW. Still they are narrow. They are a half-inch or so too long, but I buy a half size bigger for the extra width. I have tried the 7WW, but they are really tight. I have to choose between too tight (7) and too long, but much more comfortable (7.5). Having wide feet sucks.
customer_reviews.author: The Truth

customer_reviews.title: Really great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really love these shoes. The color is slightly brighter than it looks in the photo, so keep that in mind if you plan on ordering. The canvas material isn't too thin or too thick and the padding inside the shoe provides good enough support to go through at least 6 hours of wear. The sole of the shoe is very good and strong too. I don't have any complaints about this shoe, however, of you are a person with wider feet I don't suggest these. They are sort of narrow, but they are still worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Talia Roth

customer_reviews.title: There aren't cons, only pros! Quality made, comfy, and cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love em! I wear mine daily, and will be buying them in every color. I wear a 7 1/2 , thats what I ordered and they fit comfortably shoes should,! Very durable and quality made shoes, that also look great with just about anything.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Waine

customer_reviews.title: Keds
customer_reviews.text: I have worn keds before but they must have been resized. My toe is at the end of the shoe and the sole is as flat as a pancake. I wear an 8.5m in all shoes and that’s what I got but this shoe runs small.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyroe24

customer_reviews.title: Larger than usual, but comfortable when they fit.
customer_reviews.text: Usually wear a women's size 10, originally ordered 10W, but they were way too big in the toe, and were too wide. Re-ordered size 9.5R and they fit much better, still longer in the toe than expected, but comfortable to wear all day, width was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sleez

customer_reviews.title: Fit to Order
customer_reviews.text: When I got my Keds and tried them on, they fit me perfectly! I ordered a half size larger, so my little toe is not pushing out the front sidewall of the shoe. On my right outside of my right foot, I have a broken bone,(since had healed), that rubs against the outside wall of the shoe. I get callous build-up if the shoe fits too tight. I'm diabetic and I have to be careful to get a good fit. I love the memory foam on the insole of the shoe. It has just enough foam to feel like you are walking on air, but yet give support. I definitely plan on buying another pair in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought!
customer_reviews.text: I have a wide foot so for me the toe box is still a little iffy, but it’s better than most. They are great for just slipping on and off. I have gotten mud on mine but it was pretty easy to wash off with a paper towel and water as soon as I could. I haven’t gotten the mark off completely but I was happy that it’s easy. I can’t really tighten the shoe though so sometimes my heel pops out, but other than that I really have enjoyed them.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: So nice to know you will get a good fit
customer_reviews.text: I love Keds because they have a simple construction, a clean look, wash well, and fit exactly the same over the years, as long as my foot remains the same. The only thing I had to consider was the color choice. These shoes fit into my wardrobe because they are classic. These were a good buy and came to my house exactly as I had requested.
customer_reviews.author: Gentleman Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Chinese feet are smaller than ours!
customer_reviews.text: The problem with these shoes is that they are not made for American feet. They are just quite not wide enough so you end up with bunions. When I was a little younger, I bit the bullet, but now they just make my feet hurt - and yet if you need white sneakers, what can you do. Maybe someday they will go back to making them in the US and they will fit us once again.
customer_reviews.author: Minnie

customer_reviews.title: Love the wider width
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted à pair of neutral colored everyday sneakers. I bought the Grey in 6.5 wide. Nice lightweight shoes! They aren't arch supportive, but I've owned many pairs of Keds and they never are. Just great around the house, running errands etc. Don't plan to do long treks in them.
customer_reviews.author: lorik4

customer_reviews.title: The size is weird but shoe was good
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy New Balance footwear but wanted a pair of casual sneakers for a specific outfit & didn't want to pay a lot. I usually wear size 10 D but after reading some reviews decided to drop back a half-size. The width is perfect but the length is another thing altogether. Despite dropping back to a 9.5 they still have a good inch extra in the toes. Not a big problem, I can compensate. Since I don't plan to wear these all that often it's still a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Marlyn R.

customer_reviews.title: THey're Not What They Used To Be
customer_reviews.text: I have worn a size 5 1/2 for years and in the past, Keds used to fit perfectly. But now they are making a longer and narrower shoe so that I have to wear a pair of tennis socks so they don't slip off. I don't like the look of this and the socks make the shoe a bit tight and too warm. Also, the shoes have less support and are generally an inferior product. I won't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Reader

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a shoe that fits!
customer_reviews.text: I've had abnormally large and wide feet my entire life. As a woman, society says I'm supposed to have small skinny feet, at least that's what they sell on typical store shelves... I had a coworker recommend Keds because she too has large wide feet. Amazing! They sell my ACTUAL size! No more mens shoes or having to buy a larger size in order to get the width I need, or just being in pain all the time. I can wear these everywhere, with everything and it's as close to barefoot, I think I can get. Love keds! Thank you for not stereotyping women!
customer_reviews.author: K. Litza

customer_reviews.title: Classic Brand that Remains True to Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Keds for at least 60 years and the original characteristics of quality, durability and comfort continue to be the hallmark of this product. I also love the fact I can throw them in a bucket of bleach water and keep them nice and white. I have all brands of sneakers in my closet but I can't imagine not having a pair of Keds as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, light, and quiet....yeah I said quiet! Read On : )
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 7 XW and it fits perfectly! It fits much better and more comfortable than I thought it would and am pleasantly surprised! Im normally a 7.5 and had to go down a half size. Im in my 30s and hadnt worn Keds since I was a teen but now Im hooked all over again! If you find Chucks are too narrow or Vans suppress air like some weird fart no matter if I go up or down a size, like I do then these are calling your name. Already searching my next pair!
customer_reviews.author: AleeCali_co39031

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had them for two weeks, worn them a handful of times while switching with other shoes, and I don’t walk more than the average person. The soles inside the shoe have already started to come apart. I can align them Andy press hard so they stick, but after some walking they move around and become extremely uncomfortable in my shoe and need to be fixed. I don’t know if I got a bad apple, or if it’s a poor vendor.
customer_reviews.author: K.os

customer_reviews.title: Easily the most comfortable shoes I own
customer_reviews.text: I can stand and walk in these all day and my feet never hurt. Don't take that lightly because my feet ALWAYS hurt, even since I was a kid. I wear my expensive Brooks sneakers all day and my feet hurt. I have so many different types of shoes and my feet always end up hurting after a few hours. But not in these Keds. I hope Keds never stops making these classics!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Toe area is narrow and the tongue doesn't come high enough
customer_reviews.text: I returned these shoes. The toe area was way too narrow and tight. The tongue of the shoe was very short. I would have had to wear no show socks, which I hate. I've had other shoes that come up high enough where wearing a regular sock is fine, but not with these. I liked the plush comfort inside the shoe but only tried them on for 10 seconds so I don't know how they hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mom who is three states away. She loved them they fit perfectly no guessing on my part. I just picked out her shoe size and sent them. She received them two days later and loved them. She just slips them on and off she goes. I will be purchasing more when she lets me know she has worn them out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I never had a pair of Keds but needed them for a dance performance. They always look so narrow on people’s feet so I ordered wide width. I should have ordered normal width. I kept them because it was too late to return them and I’ll wear thicker socks to take up the room. Otherwise, I like the look and they had more support than I thought they would; comfortable for dancing.
customer_reviews.author: JFA

customer_reviews.title: Agree w/ other reviewers...
customer_reviews.text: that this is not the same Keds from years past. Shoelaces were much narrower, and that may make no difference but it did look strange. Shoes were not as comfortable and over all, just not 'right'.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little larger than my other pairs of the same size
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn Keds for years, always the same size. My last pair (also ordered on Amazon) was starting to fall apart so I ordered another pair in the same size. My only complaint is that they are a little bigger/longer and looser than my other pair. I have to wear thick socks with them to make sure they don’t come off my feet when I walk. But they look nice.
customer_reviews.author: katie beach

customer_reviews.title: Well made shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were exactly what I was looking for as I can rarely find narrow sizes in tennis shoes at chain retail shoe stores. They are a little snug now but I am sure that they will stretch some due to them being made of canvas. I am very happy with them and will buy more from Keds when I need them.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Varner

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not the same shoe...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased this same pair from the same seller here on Amazon before and this last pair.. fits completely different than my first! The ones I have now are loose and rub against my pinky toe when I walk even though I bought the same size. I loved the fit and look of the first pair on my feet but one of the metal pieces by the laces came loose so I gladly bought another pair. To my surprise, I was really disappointed with my second purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Love Keds
customer_reviews.text: I’m a loyal keds customer I always have a pair of the white canvas ones. But keds have zero idea what wide means 😂 they run way narrow. I have wide feet where my toes are and my heels are normal/narrow and I’ve never had any issue with most M or W shoes sometimes the wife’s are even too wide but with kids the M is narrow AF and the wide MIGHT be a real M. I’d buy XW if I could 😂
customer_reviews.author: Sam&Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Very long for the size
customer_reviews.text: I always remember my Keds from when I was a kid to run a bit narrow so I ordered my usual size but in an XW. These must be about 1 size too big. More like a 10.5 instead of a 9.5. The width was fine, but I could wear a W it seems if I wore thin socks. Not sure if I got a defective pair as I never remember the sizing being so off before. Re-ordered in a 9W, we will see how they fit!
customer_reviews.author: purpldy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price at all
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing knock-off Keds (costing $20 or under), and decided to splurge for a real pair. What a disappontment! The toe box is very narrow and pinched my toes, and just like the cheap apirs, there is zero arch support. I'm much better off sticking with my budget-friendly sneakers than these!
customer_reviews.author: CListen

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe, it’s comfortable and sole is soft. I really could walk in them all day. The reason I only gave them 3 stars is because when I walk they make a weird sound. Like the material on the front of the shoe pops. Maybe as I wear them it will go away but for right now it’s distracting. :/
customer_reviews.author: vivi

customer_reviews.title: Walk this way.
customer_reviews.text: Ok I would have given this five stars. Keds is one the the few to offer extra wide as an option for their products. However, it also seems to add a little bit length wise too. It fits perfectly but it's a bit too long now. Also you might want to wear socks to cover the back of the foot (ankle) the first time, it rubs and created a little blister but hasn't been a problem since. Besides that, I like my red keds
customer_reviews.author: DeliaGee

customer_reviews.title: They're great!
customer_reviews.text: They're not light weight, which is good, it fits great, my feet is 24cm or 9.5 inches and I ordered size 8 as you can see on the pictures it looks amazing for casual wear. The price was really good and I love the product, I'm a happy camper :D
customer_reviews.author: Jimena De Leon

customer_reviews.title: Colour
customer_reviews.text: The colour wasn't quite what I thought it was going to be. I purchased the STONE colour and it turns out to be more brown than not. Not muted at all. I would also recommend going down a size since it turned out to be a bit slippery on the foot, but thicker socks can assist with that.
customer_reviews.author: Rain girl

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes to wear!
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet and I usually purchase W width shoes. This pair of Keds, which is my first pair of Keds, I chose XW width. The fit is loose, however, by tying the shoe laces securely, it works PERFECTLY and is SUPER comfortable. The sole is flexible and comfortable too. The length of the shoe is just right for a Size 6.
customer_reviews.author: Ann-Marie Kang

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair, I ordered a 1/2 size larger because after washing the last pair several times they shortened too much. I can walk all day in these without my feet getting tired. I have a high arch and these support really well, I haven’t found anything that is as comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: a bit bigger then norm,off a half of size!!
customer_reviews.text: about an half of size on the bigger side!! Order an half a size smaller then normal!! socks on still bigger!!socks off still big,order an half size smaller!!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfy! I've never got shoes like these before, so I didn't know how it would be. If you're like me I have some advice. You need to wear flats socks, not no show socks but ballet flats socks. Also not that great for cold or wet weather. Definitely summer shoes. But that isn't the reason why I gave it four stars. These shoes are comfy and they're long but they are very narrow. I have pretty big feet so some shoes are narrow, but these ones feel even more narrow than normal.
customer_reviews.author: Aisha

customer_reviews.title: Light, cute, fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I wear 5.5 for nike and adidas shoes. I previously purchased Keds 5.5 narrow, thought it would fit me. I fit into them but couldn’t walk in them because it was wayyyy too tight. This time I bought 5.5 wide, it fits the way I expected. My feet are closer to narrow then wide but Keds narrow was too small for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jelly

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly low quality for price
customer_reviews.text: In the ‘90’s, KEDS used to be my go to summer months shoes but I have a huge complaint with the quality of them these days. Put them through a wash cycle as I’ve always done with canvas KEDS and the glue holding the soles to the cavas and the rubber gasket came apart all around on BOTH shows! They were the only sneakers I had brought on vacation as they are lightweight and had always been so reliable, but I’ll never waste my money on them again and you should not either, especially as they aren’t $20 anymore either. Poor craftsmanship, KEDS!
customer_reviews.author: Maddy Klein

customer_reviews.title: My Go To
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing keds for a long time and they never fail me. They fit perfectly. They have a great range of sizes, I wear a 9.5W and its very hard to find the half size & a wide together, but Keds has them. Always. They are comfortable and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Janis R.

customer_reviews.title: Size up.
customer_reviews.text: Still 5 stars for these shoes even though they're very small. I am usually a size 8 or 8.5 and I think I will have to order a 9. My feet aren't narrow or wide, so if you have wide feet I'm not sure if these shoes will be comfortable. Anyways, these shoes are what I was looking for. Plain black shoes that go with everything. I don't always want to wear a basic black flat, sometimes I need/want the sturdiness of a tennis shoe and this shoe fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: POSSIBLE COUNTERFEIT ITEM
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in these shoes. First of all, the box they came in wasn’t a Ked’s shoe box. The box was a plain brown shoe box. The shoes were very flimsy and right away I could tell they weren’t true to size. I sent them back and reordered a smaller size. I received them yesterday and they came in an authentic Ked’s shoe box. They fit perfectly. So, beware of counterfeit items such as these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: AmAshopper

customer_reviews.title: Cute Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are a nice gray color - not too light so that they would show scuffs easily. They are light weight and fit well. I wear a size 11, and they were true to size for me. My foot is just slightly narrow, and these were not too wide. I wore them the first time without socks, and did not experience any issues.
customer_reviews.author: JRC

customer_reviews.title: Sizing off, not sure how
customer_reviews.text: Tried on in store and bought here because of price and the color we needed. These actually fit a lot bigger than the pair that was tried on in the store. My teenager refused to allow me to return them, as continually complaining about it is far more fun that fixing it, and she needed them for a certain date. So, returning them was out of the question. It's irritating, though. I get to hear about it, pretty much all the time.
customer_reviews.author: celestialbev

customer_reviews.title: True to size, very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Love! I ordered these because they offered wide widths. They fit true to size (I am a size 8) and are very comfy. I ordered the grey pair and the color was true to the picture. I get lots of compliments, will be ordering other colors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useless in Less than a Year
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 6.5 months ago and the sole is separating from the rest of the shoe. I am really disappointed. I bought these on a recommendation that they were good for feet that swell, and they were good. I was able to wear them after multiple foot surgeries, and I wore them almost every day for the last 6 months since nothing else fit, but they are quite literally falling apart at the seems. For the price, I expected more.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally mis-sized!  No cushioning at all.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 10 W. The shoe is over an inch too long, yet the width is excruciatingly narrow. I barely got my foot in. I think what I received, although labeled a 10W is more like an 11 narrow :( The footbed is quite hard and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Patty D

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE PRODUCT I ORDERED
customer_reviews.text: I am a long-time Keds wearer and love that they have options in Narrow (10 2A is a hard size). BUT this is not the product I ordered: online the image of these Keds were white with a lacy, eyelet-type pattern. I was disappointed when I opened my package and found plain white Keds. I will keep the shoes, because I will eventually need a new pair of white Keds, but this was NOT what I thought I was getting. Would not have purchased right now because I do not need a new pair of regular white Keds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: These are my first pair of real keds. I’ve had a few knock off brands in the last that were cute and okay, but these were definitely worth the extra $. They aren’t super expensive either way, but these are definitely more sturdy and more comfortable than any knock offs! I’m so excited to have these to wear with my summer dresses since I work with children so sandals and flats aren’t practical.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow foot so this shoe fit a little loose but not enough for me not to be able to wear it. I currently wear them with no socks and haven't had any blisters or anything. Very comfortable sole. The color is bright which I love! would love to buy more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Love these Keds!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two pairs of these. One in leather and the other in canvas. You will see my glowing review on the other pair. I will always give these Keds five stars. These shoes are always true to size and are so comfortable. I wear them winter and summer. They are the best and always compliment your casual wear. I might note that I wash my Keds all the time in the washer, regardless of the color. I just let them air dry, restring them and they look good as new. Still the most stylish sneaker made.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Hamon

customer_reviews.title: Back to basics.
customer_reviews.text: I feel as though I am returning to my youth. I wore these shoes growing up. I have a narrow foot and you can rarely get the option for a narrow shoe. I am tired of my feet swimming in regular shoes. These are comfortable and fit well and come in a variety of colors for accessorizing any out without spending a fortune.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Keds Women's Champion Core Canvas Sneakers
product_meta.description:
The Champion Core Sneakers in navy define the term classic sneaker. The Champion canvas sneaker was an instant American classic when it was first introduced (over 100 years ago), and its iconic design, goes-with-everything style, and cushiony comfort has made it a worldwide favorite today.

- Classic canvas upper.
- 4 eyelet lace up sneaker.
- Soft breathable lining.
- Cushioned Ortholite insole.
- Flexible, textured rubber outsole.
- Care instructions: spot wash, air dry only.
- Collection: Spring - Summer
